title: Public Records Request – BWC Footage - Arrest of Michelle Eastman (12/11/2024)

communications.communication:
Dear Records Custodian,

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records relating to the arrest of Michelle Lynn Eastman on December 11, 2024, by the Flagler County Sheriff’s Office:

All body-worn camera (BWC) or AXON footage associated with the stop, search, and arrest that occurred on or near US1 and Hibiscus Avenue, Bunnell, FL, by Officer Daniel Weaver (#412)  as referenced in Case #2025 CF 000298 / Agency Case #2024-00106334.

Dash camera and in-vehicle footage (if applicable) from any involved patrol vehicles during the incident.

Evidence logs or photos related to seized narcotics (fentanyl, cocaine, marijuana) as described in the affidavit.

AXON evidence.com upload logs, if applicable, showing timestamps of submitted digital media for this case.

Please include any responsive materials in digital format, if available, and inform me of any potential costs prior to processing.

If any portion of the requested materials is exempt under Florida law, please cite the specific exemption and release the rest of the non-exempt record and or footage.

Thank you for your assistance.

title: Public Records Request – BWC Footage - Arrest of Demani Evans (1/8/25)

communications.subject: Wisconsin Open Records Act Request: Public Records Request – BWC Footage - Arrest of Demani Evans (1/8/25)
communications.communication:
Dear Records Custodian,

I am requesting access to public records under the Wisconsin Open Records Law 
related to the arrest of Demani Evans (DOB: 08/09/2003) on or around 
January 8, 2025, by the Brookfield Police Department.

Specifically, I am requesting body-worn camera footage and in-vehicle camera footage. 
Surveillance footage, also, if obtained by the police department during the incident.

The incident reportedly took place at Raising Cane’s drive-thru in Brookfield, WI, involving a stolen 
vehicle and also involved a subsequent police pursuit.

Please let me know if there are any fees associated with fulfilling this request. Electronic delivery is preferred.

title: Public Record Request - BWC Footage - Arrest of R. Brassfield and N. Edmonson (2/28/2023)

communications.subject: Ohio Open Records Law Request: Public Record Request - BWC Footage - Arrest of R. Brassfield and N. Edmonson (2/28/2023)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Body-Worn Camera footage and in-vehicle camera footage from officers involved with the arrest of Roger Brassfield and Natalie Edmonson on the date of Febraury 28th, 2023.

"Englewood 23-0000338: Roger A. Brassfield, 36, of Kettering, was charged with possession of drug paraphernalia. Natalie M. Edmonson, 21, at large, was charged with possession of drug paraphernalia, theft at Meijer and obstructing official business and was arrested on an active warrant. Brassfield and Edmonson were transported to the Montgomery County Jail."

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter.

title: Public Records Request - Troop A - Camera Footage - Pursuit and Arrest of Heaven Brander (5/25/24)

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Public Records Request - Troop A - Camera Footage - Pursuit and Arrest of Heaven Brander (5/25/24)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern,

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I am requesting the following records from the Florida Highway Patrol regarding an incident that occurred in the early morning hours of May 25, 2024:

All dash camera footage and any other in-vehicle mounted video recorded during the pursuit of a dark-colored SUV bearing Florida license plate AM16ST, which began in Santa Rosa County around 2:58 AM and continued into Escambia County, Florida.

All  and body-worn camera footage from the officers involved with the subsequent arrest of Heaven Brander, who was the driver of the SUV at the time.

Records authored by Trooper K.A. Davis, who was involved in the stop and created Report #: FHP99ARR68556 and/or Case #: FHP24ON0262026 / RCC24IN0400933.

The subject of this incident was later identified as Heaven Narie Brander (DOB: 10/26/2005), who was transported to Sacred Heart Hospital following the crash and later booked into the Santa Rosa County Jail. The report references dashcam footage as being available at the time of the report.

Please inform me of any potential costs prior to fulfilling this request. I would prefer the records in digital/electronic format, if available.

If this request is too broad or if further clarification is needed, I would be happy to narrow the scope.

Thank you for your time and attention.

title: Georgia Open Records Act Request — Body Worn Camera Footage - Arrest of Chasity Pierce Ciccone (6/6/2025)

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Georgia Open Records Act Request — Body Worn Camera Footage - Arrest of Chasity Pierce Ciccone (6/6/2025)
communications.communication:
Dear Records Custodian,

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act (§ 50-18-70 et seq.), I respectfully request the following records related to an incident that occurred on or around June 6, 2025, involving Chasity Pierce Ciccone (DOB: 04/01/1999), who was booked at Lowndes County Jail on charges including Battery (Warrant No. 25EW02633):

Any and all body-worn camera footage and in-vehicle camera footage from responding deputies, investigators, or other LCSO personnel relating to this incident. 
The reported location was:
2045 Casamonica Drive B30, Lake Park, GA 31601.

Please provide the records in digital format if possible. If there are any fees for locating or copying these records, please inform me prior to processing. 

If parts of this request are exempt under the law, please provide the non-exempt portions and cite the specific exemption for any redacted or withheld content.

Thank you for your time and attention.

title: IPRA Request – BWC Footage - NMSU Police Arrest of Maria Tenorio (03/08/25)

communications.subject: New Mexico Inspection of Public Records Act Request: IPRA Request – BWC Footage - NMSU Police Arrest of Maria Tenorio (03/08/25)
communications.communication:
Dear Records Custodian,

Pursuant to the New Mexico Inspection of Public Records Act (IPRA), I hereby am requesting records related to an arrest that took place on March 8, 2025.
This arrest  supposedly happened between 9 AM and 11 AM, which occurred at or near Standley Dr and Research Drive, Dona Ana County, NM.

This arrest was conducted by Officer Edward Chavez of the New Mexico State University Police Department.

I am requesting any available body-worn camera footage, in-vehicle cam footage, or surveillance footage related to the above-mentioned arrest, and proceeding booking.

 If there are any fees for searching or copying these records, please inform me prior to processing. 

Thank you for your time and assistance on obtaining said records.
